prompts: Create a sturdy Pokémon that resembles an elephant and has a powerful ground attack.
Imagine a Pokémon with a tough exterior and the ability to roll into a ball for defense.
Design a Pokémon that thrives in mountainous terrains and has a defensive combat style.
Give me a Pokémon that can burrow underground and has a playful personality.
Generate a Pokémon that looks like a combination of a mammoth and a rhino, with unique features.
Show me a Pokémon that is known for its resilience and can adapt to different habitats.
Make a Pokémon that uses its large tusks to dig and has a friendly demeanor.
